contain.sl: Feel free to enjoy in the pearl of the caribbean!

main-json.p-main: At Posada Casa de las Flores, we invite you to live an exceptional experience in an environment surrounded by natural beauty and comfort. Our (Hospedaje/Posada/Hostal/Lodging house/Auberge) has first quality facilities, designed to provide you with an unforgettable and affordable stay.

div-card.MP: Couple or large family? no problem

div-main.p-main: As a good lodging center we offer full kitchen availability, plenty of bathrooms, swimming pool and jacuzzi 24 hours a day, large dining room for meetings with outdoor grill, less than five minutes to reach one of the most touristic beaches of the island (Playa Parguito) and much more.
